name: polyteck
overview: These contracts can also cover other aspects of fire safety equipment such as fire extinguisher servicing, emergency lighting, testing of smoke detectors, etc. An alarm system is useless if it’s not checked regularly, as you may not be aware there’s a problem until it’s too late. If you’re a business owner with responsibility for staff and/or the general public on your premises then you need to ensure that not only do you have a good fire alarm system installed, but that you undertake regular servicing in order to make sure it’s in full working order. Fire Alarm Maintenance London through testing to ensure the complete alarm system is operating correctly - including checking that there is adequate battery backup where applicable. If, for whatever reason, your fire alarm is not operating properly in between tests, they will visit the premises and fix the problem for you. This will also make sure you comply with the requirements of your commercial insurance cover as well as giving you the peace of mind that, in the event of a fire, everything is working exactly as it should be.
